title: Venice (California)
name: Ocean Front Walk
content: Venice's Ocean Front Walk runs between Washington Blvd. to Navy.  Along the walk you will find an assortment of retailers, from tourist souvenir shops, bike rental outlets, arts and crafts booths, restaurants and "snack shacks" for dishes from around the world to hot dogs and corn dogs, ice cream, coffees and smoothies.  You'll find henna tattoo artists, chair massages practitioners, fortune tellers and more.  Of course, sit at one of the ocean-side restaurants to watch the parade of people go by.
